Build 20020125

I installed a new VM on the "Installed JREs" preference page.  I then checked it 
off as the default and clicked ok.  I got an internal error dialog (stack 
attached).  I was installing IBM JRE 1.3.0 sr10a.  I have not been able to 
reproduce it.  I realize the runnable being exec'ed doesn't necessarily 
originate from JDT debug, but that's the only lead I have to go on so far.  The 
top of the stack is:
